other_tests.findings: The liver demonstrates hyper enhancement around the gallbladder fossa. The gallbladder is distended with gallbladder wall edema and surrounding inflammation. A stone is seen within the gallbladder neck and additional stones are present within the gallbladder lumen. There is interruption of the gallbladder wall extending superiorly into the liver compatible with perforated gangrenous cholecystitis. A walled-off collection adjacent to the gallbladder measures 6.8 x 1.8 x 4.1 cm with an additional component extending along the liver capsule measuring 2.5 x 1.1 x 3.2 cm.

other_tests.procedure_name: Successful US-guided placement of pigtail catheter into the gallbladder
